price: 4. If We will, We could send down to them from the heaven a sign, to which they would bend their necks in humility.
arabic: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: in nasha nunazzil ʿalayhim mina al-samāi āyatan faẓallat aʿnāquhum lahā khāḍiʿīna
